title: Record mobile utility in Katalon Studio
description: Important: Katalon Studio versions 7.6.0 onwards.From version 7.6.0 onwards, Katalon Studio fully supports selector strategies supported by Appium except for Android Data Matcher. To learn more, see Find Mobile Objects.
